title: "spack reindex" fails
body:
Installing `git` failed (some `libintl` problem). Trying to install it again failed with the usual `no such spec in database` error:

```
$ spack install -v julia
==> Installing julia
==> Installing git
==> pcre is already installed in /xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-6.1.1/pcre-8.39-2rfd5ubv7lwztbdm4khcqkclvcontzie
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/bin/spack", line 192, in <module>
    main()
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/bin/spack", line 169, in main
    return_val = command(parser, args)
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/install.py", line 92, in install
    explicit=True)
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 916, in do_install
    run_tests=run_tests)
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 1066, in do_install_dependencies
    dep.package.do_install(**kwargs)
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 916, in do_install
    run_tests=run_tests)
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 1066, in do_install_dependencies
    dep.package.do_install(**kwargs)
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 898, in do_install
    rec = spack.installed_db.get_record(self.spec)
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/database.py", line 75, in converter
    return function(self, spec_like, *args, **kwargs)
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/database.py", line 521, in get_record
    key = self._get_matching_spec_key(spec, **kwargs)
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/database.py", line 516, in _get_matching_spec_key
    raise KeyError("No such spec in database! %s" % spec)
KeyError: 'No such spec in database! pcre@8.39%gcc@6.1.1+utf arch=linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64'
```

That error usually goes away after a `spack reindex`. However:

```
$ spack reindex
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/bin/spack", line 192, in <module>
    main()
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/bin/spack", line 169, in main
    return_val = command(parser, args)
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/reindex.py", line 31, in reindex
    spack.installed_db.reindex(spack.install_layout)
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/database.py", line 375, in reindex
    self._check_ref_counts()
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/database.py", line 396, in _check_ref_counts
    dep_key = dep.dag_hash()
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/spec.py", line 911, in dag_hash
    if self.concrete:
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/spec.py", line 756, in concrete
    self.variants.concrete and
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/spec.py", line 381, in concrete
    v in self for v in self.spec.package_class.variants)
AttributeError: type object 'Zlib' has no attribute 'variants'
```

That's a new error; I see this for the first time today.
